subtitle.track1: hello may I ask if there are tickets to Xi'an
subtitle.track2: 您好 请问有去西安的车票吗
subtitle.track3: Nín hǎo qǐngwèn yǒu qù Xī'ān de chēpiào ma
sì yuè èr shí hào de

subtitle.track1: I want to go in the morning
wait a second. I'll check it for you
subtitle.track3: shāoděng, wǒ gěi nǐ chá yīxià

subtitle.track2: 有一趟早上十点二十的火车
subtitle.track3: yǒu yī tàng zǎoshàng shí diǎn èr shí de huǒchē

subtitle.track1: arriving at Xi'an at 12:00 noon the following day
subtitle.track2: 第二天中午十二点到西安
subtitle.track3: dì èr tiān zhōngwǔ shí èr diǎn dào Xī'ān
do you want a hard sleeper or a soft sleeper

subtitle.track1: I want a soft sleeper how much is a ticket
subtitle.track2: 我想要软卧 多少钱一张
subtitle.track3: wǒ xiǎng yào ruǎnwò, duōshǎo qián yī zhāng

subtitle.track1: sì bǎi yuán nín kěyǐ míngtiān lái qǔ piào
subtitle.track2: 四百元，您可以明天来取票
subtitle.track3: 400 yuan. You can come to collect the ticket tomorrow

subtitle.track1: I'll come to collect the ticket tomorrow morning
subtitle.track3: nà wǒ míngtiān zǎoshàng lái qǔ
